original_text: You heard me say to you, “I will go away, but I will return to you.” If you loved me, you would be happy because of that. You would be happy because I will go to the Father. And he is greater than I am.
korean_text: 내가 갔다가 너희에게로 온다 하는 말을 너희가 들었나니 나를 사랑하였더라면 내가 아버지께로 감을 기뻐하였으리라 아버지는 나보다 크심이라

sentences.original_text: You heard me say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내가 너희에게 말한 것을 들었느니라

sentences.original_text: but I will return to you
you would be happy because of that
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아버지께로 가는 것을 기뻐하였을 것이라

sentences.original_text: You would be happy because I will go to the Father
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 아버지께로 가는 것을 기뻐하였을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he is greater than I am
